title: Mutiara Perdana 2: Affordable High-Rise Living in Sungai Ara
content:
Located in the growing township of Sungai Ara, Penang, Mutiara Perdana 2 is a freehold residential development that offers value-focused living with easy access to Penang’s major amenities. Designed for practicality and affordability, this development caters well to small families, first-time homeowners, and retirees looking for comfort without high costs.

mutiara perdana 2

Functional layouts designed for daily living
rise blocks with compact but efficiently planned units. Typical built-up sizes range around 700 to 900 sq ft, comprising two to three bedrooms and one or two bathrooms. The layouts are ideal for families starting out or for elderly residents who prefer manageable spaces with essential amenities nearby.

Large windows and simple interior layouts provide ample natural light and ventilation, contributing to a comfortable living environment that supports long-term residency.

Basic facilities for urban needs
density development, Mutiara Perdana 2 includes several useful facilities for daily convenience and safety:
hour security with access control



Covered parking bays



Children’s playground



Surau and open green areas



Community hall and mini mart within the vicinity
maintained, offering a modest but pleasant lifestyle for residents without the overheads of premium developments.

Connectivity and nearby amenities

One of the advantages of living in Mutiara Perdana 2 is its location. Situated in Sungai Ara, it provides access to important roads like Jalan Tun Dr Awang and Jalan Sultan Azlan Shah. The Penang International Airport and Bayan Lepas Free Industrial Zone are just a short drive away, making this development highly suitable for workers employed in the area.


Supermarkets and eateries



Schools and tuition centres



Clinics and pharmacies



Public transport stops nearby
sufficient and well-connected to other key points in Penang.
level investment opportunity

Due to its affordability and location in a maturing suburb, Mutiara Perdana 2 is popular among budget-conscious buyers and investors. Rental yields remain steady, especially from working adults and small families employed in Bayan Lepas.
